ygData.subject: RE: Jewel XLS spreadsheet
ygData.msgSnippet: Because I took that list and expanded it for my own purposes. But you are correct this is where I got a lot of my own info.  The main purpose of the xls was to
ygData.messageBody:
Because I took that list and expanded it for my own purposes.
But you are correct this is where I got a lot of my own info. The main
purpose of the xls was to put in when a skill became trivial and total cost
without failure to make an item.

Eriq

From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

Why use an XLS file? Just make a bookmark to
http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest and you will get the best jewelry list
out there.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: rich.hitz@... [SMTP:rich.hitz@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 5:04 PM
> To: Jewelers; enchanters; Enchant
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Jewel XLS spreadsheet
>
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> I hate to throw this over 3 lists, but I deleted the
> mail that has the Jewel Spreadsheet made by some one
> here (sorry i forgot your name).
> I saved the XLS, but have some ?s...
> 1) where you list the properties and bonuses: is the
> metal enchanted? does it matter? I assume that the metal
> is not enchanted.
>
> 2)For the list of base costs: what race/charisma rating?
> If in Freeport, were you of the mage class? Is that in
> the starting city for that race?
>
> Thanks.
>
> --
> Artimis
> 2nd Rank Enchanter
> Bertoxxulous
